TitleStatus: Student at the Moroccan Faculty of Engineering Sciences in Network and Computer Development.
ProfilePrestantation: 4th-year student at EMSI, specializing in Networks and Computer Systems. Passionate about web and mobile development, I have gained skills in .NET, React, Spring Boot, Django (Python), and Flutter. Currently looking for an internship to apply my knowledge and contribute to innovative projects in a dynamic environment. I am always looking for new challenges and projects that allow me to grow and push my limits.
Diplome1: University Diploma in Scientific and Technical Studies (Deust), MIP (Mathematics, Computer Science, and Physics).
Diplome2: Professional Bachelor's in (IDAI) Software Development Engineering.
Diplome3: Degree in Computer Engineering and Networks from EMSI - Five-year program - Advanced skills in IT, Software Development, and Network Management.
ProjetPFELicence: Final Year Project – UH2C-Research Morocco. Requirements analysis, functional design, database modeling and UX/UI design. Front-end development with Angular and back-end implementation with Spring Boot (REST APIs, JWT security). Front/back integration, functional testing and project management with Git. Technologies: Angular, Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, Microservices, Git.
experience.project.ekram.description: UX/UI screen design and definition of main features. Development of cross-platform mobile application using Flutter/Dart. Integration and consumption of REST APIs for data management. Technologies: Flutter, Dart, RESTful APIs, Git.
React: React.js is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
.Net: .NET is a free, cross-platform, open-source developer platform for building many different types of applications.
Flutter: Flutter is a UI toolkit from Google for building natively compiled applications for mobile.
Spring Boot: Spring Boot is a Java framework for production-ready applications.
Django: Django is a high-level Python web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design.
JavaScript: JavaScript is a lightweight, interpreted, and high-level programming language that is widely used for web applications.
Python: Python is an interpreted, high-level, often used for web development.
Android: Android is an open-source operating system primarily used for mobile devices, developed by Google.
Angular: Angular is an open-source web application framework developed by Google for building dynamic and interactive web applications.
Java: Java is an object-oriented, cross-platform programming language widely used for enterprise application development.
PostgreSQL: PostgreSQL is a robust and high-performance open-source relational database management system.
Docker: Docker is a containerization platform that enables creating, deploying, and running applications in isolated containers.
Azure: Microsoft Azure is a comprehensive cloud platform offering computing, storage, networking, and more services.
Git: Git is a distributed version control system used to track changes in files and coordinate team work.
MongoDB: MongoDB is a flexible and scalable NoSQL document-oriented database for modern applications.
